segment.phrase: Masipuling’i
Zowi amakonda kukhala pafupi ndi bambo. Amawaonelera kwanthawi akugwira ntchito. Zimasangalatsa kulota chomwe akupanga. Chomwe anapanga pomalizira chinali ndi mapiko. Chingakhale chiyani? Helikopita?

Chomwe bambo anapanga siinali helikopita – chinali chipewa chouluka. Chinthucho chinalilima mokweza pomwe bambo amanyamuka kuchoka panthaka. Kwa kanthawi, anayandama miyendo yawo ikulendewera pamwamba pa mutu wa Zowi. Kenaka anaulukira mumlengalenga!

Zowi anawakwezera dzanja pomwe bambo anazimilira. Umu ndi momwe bambo ake amachitira – sizimadziwika kuti akonza chiyani kenako. Zowi amayembekezera kuti iwo awona zosangalatsa. Amuuza zonse zomwe awone akabwerako.

Koma Zowi sanadziwe kuti bambo abwerera nthawi yanji. Anadikira, koma sanatulukire. Zowi samafuna kusewera kapena kuwerenga. Amangofuna kuwaona bambo akugwira ntchito. Choncho anapita kuchipinda chawo cha ntchito.

Bambo ndi munthu wodziwa kukonza zinthu, koma sasunga malo mwaukhondo. Panali zidutswa ponseponse – manati ndi mabauti, mawaya, ndi masipuling’i! Pomwe Zowi amakonza m’chipindacho, anali ndi ganizo. Mwina akhoza kupanga china chake payekha!

Zowi amadziwa chomwe amafuna kupanga, koma samadziwa kwenikweni kuti achipanga bwanji. Choncho, anachita zomwe bambo ake amachita. Poyamba anawerenga mabuku a kafukufuku. Kenaka, anajambula pulani. Chotsatira, anasonkhanitsa zida. Pomaliza, anakonzeka kupanga chinthu chake.

Sizinamutengere nthawi Zowi kuti amalize ntchito yake. Majombo a pinki okhala ndi masipuling’i! Anapanganso jasi ndi magalasi, ndipo anakonzeka kudumpha. Koma majombowo agwira ntchito bwino? Panali njira imodzi yokha yodziwira.

Zowi anayamba nkhawa. Zingatani ngati majombo ake sakugwira ntchito? Anadina batani lomwe linali pambali pa majombo ake ndipo anadikira. Masipuling’i anayamba kugwira ntchito, ndipo Zowi anadumphira m’mwamba. Agwira ntchito! Amafunitsitsa kuwaonetsa bambo.

Posakhalitsa Zowi anazolowera majombo ake. Anadumphadumpha mumsewu, kujowa m’masitepesi, kujowera kumanzere ndi kumanja. Kwa kanthawi, samawasowanso bambo. Anatanganidwa ndi choseweretsa chake chatsopano!
Koma chinachake chinalakwika. Zowi anadumphitsa kwambiri. Amayembekeza kutera pansi, koma sizinatero. M’malo mwake, Zowi anaulukira m’malere, kudutsa madenga, kudutsanso mbalame ndi mitambo.

Zowi amangopitabe, mpaka anafika kunyenyezi. Panalibe choti achite! Mwadzidzidzi anaima. Ndipo patapita kanthawi, anazindikira kuti akugwa, pansi, pansi, pansi. Zowi anatseka maso ake ndi kuyembekezera kuona zoopsa.
Koma pansi pake, wina wake amayandama m’malere kumuyembekezera Zowi. Bambo anali atafika kuchokera koyenda ndipo amafufuza mwana wawo. Mwadzidzidzi anamuona mwana wawo akutsetserekera kwa iwo.
“Bambo!” anakuwa Zowi pamene anamuwakha m’malere.
“Ukutani m’mwamba muno?” anafunsa bambo.
“Kuyesa chomwe ndapanga!” anatero Zowi.
Atafika panthaka, Zowi anawaonetsa bambo ake momwe majombo aja amagwirira ntchito. Bambo anawayang’anitsitsa.
“Ndikudziwa chomwe tikuyenera kuchita nawo tsopano,” anatero.
Bambo anapita kuchipinda chawo cha ntchito ndipo anabwera ndi majombo ena aakulu. “Taona, tonse tsopano tili ndi masipuling’i!” anatero.
Zowi anamwetulira. Tsopano akhoza kumayendera limodzi.
